openingHours.@value: Open Daily 10am-5pm (Closed Christmas Day). Māori Culture Performance 3 x daily - 11am, 12pm, 1.30pm.  Guided Tours leave the Front Foyer daily at 10.30 and 2pm.
Aperto tutti i giorni 10-17 (giorno di Natale chiuso). Māori cultura prestazioni 3 volte al giorno - 11, 12, 1.30 pm.  Visite guidate di lasciare l'atrio anteriore tutti i giorni alle 10.30 e 14.
打开每天 10 上午-5 下午 (封闭圣诞节)。毛利人文化性能 3 x 每天-11 上午，12 下午，1.30 pm。 导赏的团离开每日在 10: 30 和 2 下午门厅前。
Abra el diario 10:00-17:00 (cerrado el día de Navidad). Māori cultura rendimiento 3 x día - 11:00, 12:00, 1.30 pm.  Visitas guiadas dejan el vestíbulo frente diariamente a las 10.30 y 14:00.

Aberto diariamente 10:00-17:00 (fechado dia de Natal). Māori cultura desempenho 3 x diariamente - 11:00, 12:00, 1.30 pm.  Visitas guiadas deixem o Hall de entrada frontal diariamente às 10: 30 e 14:00.
毎日 10-17 (閉じたクリスマス) を開きます。毎日 - 11、12、1.30 x マオリの文化パフォーマンス 3 pm。 ガイド付きツアーは、毎日 10 時 30 分と 14 時フロント ロビーを残します。
Открыто ежедневно 10 утра - 5 вечера (закрытые Рождество). Маори культура производительности 3 x ежедневно - 11 утра, 12 вечера, 1.30 pm.  Экскурсии оставить передняя фойе ежедневно с 10.30 до 14.00.
Geöffnet täglich 10:00-17:00 (geschlossene Weihnachtstag). Māori Kultur Leistung 3 x täglich - 11:00, 12:00, 1.30 Uhr.  Führungen lassen die Front Foyer täglich um 10.30 Uhr und 14:00.

Ouvert tous les jours 10:00-17:00 (fermé jour de Noël). Māori Culture Performance 3 x par jour - 11:00, 12:00, 13 h 30 pm.  Visites guidées quittent le Foyer avant tous les jours à 10 h 30 et de 14:00.

Buka setiap hari 10 pagi - 5 petang (tutup hari Krismas). English Māori budaya prestasi 3 x setiap hari - 11: 00, 12: 00, 1,30 pm.  Lawatan berpandu meninggalkan ruang legar Penyambut setiap hari pada pukul 10.30 dan pukul 2 petang.

description.@value: No donation is requested from visitors from the Auckland region. A donation of $10 per adult is suggested for all non-Aucklanders and international residents. Charges may apply for special exhibitions and programmes. Aucklanders, please bring your I AM AUCKLAND MUSEUM card or proof of residence. Children aged 15 years and under are free.
